languages.text: "Скорее мудрость. Умному человеку стоит знать обо всем, что происходит в его доме, даже в темных его уголках".
"I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."
languages.original_text: "Скорее мудрость. Умному человеку стоит знать обо всем, что происходит в его доме, даже в темных его уголках".

traits.locale_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough knows that they should be aware of everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich würde es Weisheit nennen. Wer nicht gänzlich dumm ist, der begreift, dass er alles wissen sollte, was in seinem Zuhause vor sich geht, selbst in den dunkelsten Ecken."
languages.original_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde es Weisheit nennen. Wer nicht gänzlich dumm ist, der begreift, dass er alles wissen sollte, was in seinem Zuhause vor sich geht, selbst in den dunkelsten Ecken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pour ma part, j'y vois un signe de sagesse. Nul besoin d'être un génie pour comprendre qu'il vaut mieux se tenir au courant de tout ce qui se passe sous son propre toit, et ce, jusque dans ses moindres recoins. »
languages.original_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ma part, j'y vois un signe de sagesse. Nul besoin d'être un génie pour comprendre qu'il vaut mieux se tenir au courant de tout ce qui se passe sous son propre toit, et ce, jusque dans ses moindres recoins. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Yo diría que es sabiduría. Cualquiera suficientemente inteligente sabe que es mejor estar al tanto de todo lo que sucede en su hogar, incluso en los rincones más oscuros».
languages.original_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."

traits.locale_text: «Yo diría que es sabiduría. Cualquiera suficientemente inteligente sabe que es mejor estar al tanto de todo lo que sucede en su hogar, incluso en los rincones más oscuros».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それを知恵と呼ぶ。頭の回転が速い人なら、家の中で起きていることは、たとえその家の一番暗い隅っこの出来事だとしても、全て把握しておくべきだと理解している」
languages.original_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."

traits.locale_text: 「それを知恵と呼ぶ。頭の回転が速い人なら、家の中で起きていることは、たとえその家の一番暗い隅っこの出来事だとしても、全て把握しておくべきだと理解している」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我会将这称之为智慧。每个足够聪明的人都会意识到，他们必须了解家里当下发生的一切，哪怕是最阴暗的角落也不容忽视。”
languages.original_text: "I would call it wisdom. Anyone smart enough understands that they should know everything that goes on in their home, even in its darkest corners."

traits.locale_text: “我会将这称之为智慧。每个足够聪明的人都会意识到，他们必须了解家里当下发生的一切，哪怕是最阴暗的角落也不容忽视。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
